class.name: GFComponentBuilder
class.brief_description: Builder for a new component type.
class.description: This example shows the creation of a [i]Jump[/i] component: [codeblock] GFComponentBuilder.new() \ .set_name("Jump") \ .add_member("jump_velocity", TYPE_FLOAT) \ .build() [/codeblock]

method.name: add_member
method.description: Adds a member to the new component.

method.name: build
method.description: Creates the new component from the settings of the builder.

method.name: new_in_world
method.description: Returns a new builder in [param world].
